name: Scale Shot
description: You blast your scales at a foe in range. Make five ranged attacks against one target in range. On each hit, deal 1d4 dragon damage; if any attack hit, deal an additional MOVE dragon damage (maximum once).
Until the end of your next turn, you have +10ft of movement and -2 AC.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
